abstract: Apple‘s former chief financial officer, Fred D. Anderson, is preparing to settle with the Securities and Exchange Commission over the dating of an option grant to senior officials in January 2001, The New York Times reported Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Apple‘s former chief financial officer, Fred D. Anderson, is preparing to settle with the Securities and Exchange Commission over the dating of an option grant to senior officials in January 2001, The New York Times reported Tuesday.

headline.main: Apple’s Ex-C.F.O. Reaches for Settlement with S.E.C.
